\* Success cannot be defined by attention, high-production value worship "experiences", or programs. Hot Take: the "Attractional Church" model is largely a commercial success but a failure in that it has metastasized what is in lika a tumor or an autoimmune disease, in the development of a healthy body within Christianity. 

\* This expresses into messages we get on a Sunday are filtered through what we the audience will tolerate to hear.
